work: Worked as a part of Hacktoberfest event on DOM Wizard for aiding easier dom manipulation.
Contributed as one of the primary contributors by building functions to read an attribute of the element.
Built a mini redux like store to use variables accross the application using localStorage.
Retrieval and Creation of the store object in DOM Wizard is the primary feature contributed from my side.
Working as a SDE Intern, primarily focused on the full stack part of the application.
Contributed on the enhancement of UI by building image crop functionality and notification streams.
Worked exclusively on forms and validation.
Built the authentication system in the backend part using firebase and majorly helped to link mutliple auth providers to a single account.
